approval_rationale: The modifications have achieved significant improvement across all four quality dimensions. The overall score increased from 6.9 to 7.5 (+0.6), exceeding the 0.3 threshold. Persona Fit showed the largest gain (+0.9), directly addressing the primary target issue. All five modified chapters improved, with gains ranging from +0.57 to +0.7. No regressions detected. The modifications successfully addressed the identified usability gaps through concrete benchmarks, clarified terminology, and quick-reference elements.
notes: Largest gains in Persona Fit (+0.9) and Clarity (+0.7), aligning with improvement plan targets
Combat Basics chapter improved significantly in Practical Usability (+0.55)
Domain expert flagged Skill bonus contradiction for future resolution (does not block approval)
recommendation: Proceed to human gate for final approval before applying changes to book
